findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not be sufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially exposing the disclosing party to risks if information remains sensitive beyond this period.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without requiring a bond may pose significant risk to the receiving party, as it can lead to immediate and potentially unjustified restrictions.
findings.evidence_quote: Therefore, the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: The restriction on assignment may limit the ability of either party to transfer obligations or rights, potentially affecting business continuity and operational flexibility.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
